name: SolutionBuilt
description:
SolutionBuilt is a website and mobile app development company located in Atlanta, GA. Our agency provides both iOS and android app design, development, and maintenance services. Our staff is experienced in the development of cross-platform applications for web and mobile users.Â We design and develop mobile apps to extend your message on Apple and Android handheld, tablet and wearable devices.
We create apps that can be used privately in the enterprise or publicly available in iTunes and Google Play stores. Our agency is your one-stop-shop to fulfill all your design, development and marketing needs. Your complete satisfaction with our mobile, web and SEO services is paramount to our success. We look forward to working with you!
